title: Ego development: the core of a healthy personality(TEFC)
creator_credit: Arthur M Kaye and Davidson Films
brief_description: Analyses the establishment of ego qualities and the setting and achievement of goals in very young children. Proper resolution of the conflict between biological, psychic, and societal demands leads to the establishment of a healthy ego
title_for_label: Ego development: the core of a healthy personality(TEFC)
